pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-/Three-Stage Designs for Phase 12 Clinical Trials // Calculate optimal Zhong's two-/three-stage Phase II designs (see Zhong (2012) doi:10.1016/j.cct.2012.07.006). Generate two -/three-stage dose finding decision table. This package also allows users to run dose-finding simulations based on customized decision table.
